channel.title: Comments on: Lemonheads plan ‘It’s a Shame About Ray’ tour

item.title: By: Rob
item.dc:creator: Rob
item.description: Oh shit I just bought a ticket to a uk show. I saw him on his latest album which one show he was great and the other was a miss match off him forget the words. He must have been back on the sauce
item.content:encoded: Oh shit I just bought a ticket to a uk show. I saw him on his latest album which one show he was great and the other was a miss match off him forget the words. He must have been back on the sauce
